Reviews.Title: “Modern looking interior”
Reviews.Author: Alexandr21
Reviews.Content: The exterior of this hotel seems like its going through a renovation that has not yet started, so I was very surprised how good the hotel lobby looks. This hotel must be under renovation because the exterior and interior dont match what so ever. I stayed on the ground level in a 2 queen size bed suit, was very surprised with how great the room looked. Nothing too fancy but all the basics were there.. Only down side was that it cost 10$ to order a in room movie, while at the Marriott its only $5. This hotel has a nice looking but small indoor pool as well as a gym.. I got a great deal 65$ for the night, so it was by far worth it as Ive payed much more to stay at much worst places.

Reviews.Title: “Great and helpful service”
Reviews.Author: Melbat3
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel overnight just prior to a trip to France for 2 weeks. The front desk staff were extremelh helpful when i needed help with a number of items -- helping me to check my PIN on my credit card to ensure it worked, printing out duplicate copies of airpplane boarding passes and other critical travel items. When the computer service to the Business Centre was interuppted one of the staff let me use her office to complete my transactions and print my last travel documents.

Reviews.Title: “TINA”
Reviews.Author: Tina C
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is fantastic! very friendly staff in both Hotel and Perkins from the time of arrival till you leave. They cannot do enough for you, spoiled us totally!! Perkins food is great and accomodated all our family needs with its great kids menu. These beds are unbelievable, I have never slept so well in my life. If you are going to stay near the airport you MUST stay here!!! Best Holiday Inn ever!!!

Reviews.Title: “It's OK”
Reviews.Author: bensagle
Reviews.Content: An older Holiday Inn that's been recently renovated; rooms are up to average HI standard. Awfully long walk to get to them from the lobby to the elevator, and ask for a room not on the 1st floor (rooms are on long, narrow hall that everyone has to walk past to get to elevators). The staff were pleasant and professional. 6am breakfast isn't early enough for an airport hotel. 6/10

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly nice”
Reviews.Author: wloo_andrew
Reviews.Content: We were flying out early one morning last week so thought we would stay at one of the airport hotels. I left it somewhat late so there was not a lot of choice, but we picked the Holiday Inn Airport East and were very surprised and pleased. I think it was recently renovated and it is very nice. The staff were very friendly and welcoming. The room was a very good size. We had a good meal (a huge chicken spinach salad) in the hotel restaurant. The flights were coming in right over the hotel that night (very cool!) but stopped around 11 pm so we had a good night sleep. Very easy shuttle to the airport. All in all, a very good stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service Group Stay”
Reviews.Author: bruce t
Reviews.Content: Close to airport and major hwy (401) means easy access to both. Reception was well above average being friendly fast and efficient. Rooms are large and clean. From carpets to bedding everything seemed like new. Lots of food service nearby but in house restaurant has great menu selection. We booked one night for six (3 rooms) all were comfortable. More than met our expectations.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT”
Reviews.Author: riki82
Reviews.Content: stayed here over night before going on are vacation last year just one night all it took to like this hotel liked it so much going to book it before my vacation this year its really great if you flight is going out early in the morning or flight coming in late at night

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay!”
Reviews.Author: Wino77
Reviews.Content: I stayed here on the weekend with a friend. Check in was great; well organized and friendly staff. Hotel was clean and bright. Rooms were a great size, decorated nicely and had comfy beds & pillows. Attached to the hotel is a Perkins which is ideal for breakfast or family style food. Overall, I enjoyed my stay. No complaints. Great location with many restaurants, ie-suishi, moxies, milestones nearby if Perkins isn't what you are looking for. We ate at Perkins and staff were extremely friendly and food was good. I think many people will stay here who are flying out on vacation. I saw the Shuttle coming and going taking people to the airport. I didn't get a chance to use the pool but the hotel does have one. I've stayed at Holiday Inn's in the past and am impressed with the new modern look they are creating!

Reviews.Title: “Very Impressed!!!”
Reviews.Author: Brix12
Reviews.Content: WOW..WOW...WOW.....Its amazing what can be done with renovations. I stayed here a couple of years ago prior to the recent renovations and I'm shocked at the transformation of this property. Beautiful lobby, friendly staff, and bright cheery atmosphere is what to expect. We stayed here prior to flying out on vacation a couple of weeks ago. Shuttle was on time, easy to use and completely a flawless process. It was nice for us to stay the night before flying out and being able to park at the hotel for the week. Staff throughout this property were always smiling, and welcoming. We had breakfast at Perkins which was perfect. Not one complaint. It was a refreshing send off to our much needed vacation. I'm thoroughly impressed with the holiday inn's new image!! They have brought class to an affordable stay. Rooms are a great size, and redecorated very modernly. Equipped with flat screen tv's and very comfy beds. I had to ask for extra towels which were delivered promptly. The only thing I would recommend is for the hotel to provide bathrobes. Our room didn't have any. I will defnately recommend this to friends and stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: funkynassau1
Reviews.Content: We've stayed here a couple of times when flying out of Toronto. They offer a good deal to leave your car there, take the shuttle to the airport and back, as well as have a hotel room. We needed the hotel at the end of the trip this time. We stayed there Feb 7/8 2012. The room had two queen beds and 4 pillows per bed, all was very comfy after a rock-like bed in Mexico! Nice bathroom, they give you shampoo etc. Big screen tv, nice arm chair and ottoman, desk, office chair, data port for your computer. Fairly quiet considering it's almost at the airport. Didnt eat there or use any facilities, it was for a good sleep only, and we got that. Will go there again next time.

Reviews.Title: “Had a very good hotel accomodations.”
Reviews.Author: Denis V B
Reviews.Content: Very rare these days. Each employee I passed by in the morning would say ''Good Morning.'' It helps to start the day on a positive note. Met the Director of Sales and Marketing, Ms. Nadia Gelmo. V. kind person and a great asset for this Hotel. I know, I used to work at the Chatreau Frontenac (Fairmont Hotel) in QuÃ©bec City. She helped me with my faxes, answered questions I had and she gave me a little souvenir, a nice Holiday Inn pen (writes well). When I registered, the lady at the front desk was very friendly too. Got my bill under the door early morning. Didn't have to check out. . It helps to be a ''Platinum Priority Club Member.'' All these little details made my sÃ©jour more agreable. There is a great pool, souvenir shop and nice restaurant. Will return there When I'm back in Toronto. Sincerely, Denis V. Bouchard,MBA VP Business Development Beauce Atlas inc.(QuÃ©bec)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value!”
Reviews.Author: Stevie36
Reviews.Content: nicely updated, clean and reasonably priced hotel, conveniently located close to the Toronto Congress Centre. Will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice new renos”
Reviews.Author: TorontoRobDT
Reviews.Content: I stayed here a night before flying out of Pearson and was impressed with the renovations from the year before---the carpet in the hallways must have just been laid as there was the new carpet smell. Check-in was quick and the agent was very nice, plus, I used the shuttle service from and to the airport and both drivers were very professional and friendly. Note: for the return shuttle you need to let them know when checking in so they can give you a shuttle ticket. The room assigned to me was on floor two and it was spacious enough for one night though not as big as the one I had the previous year. It was room 237 and I think all the 37 rooms are the ones tucked away in the corner. The only drawback for this room if you have an extended stay is that unlike most of the rooms here with floor to ceiling windows, this one has a tiny window. The bathroom was down a little hallway close to the entry door. The advantage to this little hallway is that it provided distance from the main door so noise was not a problem at all, however, the heater was by the window and it never seemed to get to the bathroom resulting a cooler room to shower in. Overall, I would certainly stay here again for those quick nights when I have an early flight as the room and hotel was very clean. The restaurant did not look appealing though, but just a few mins of walking and there are other restaurants and a Timmies close by. The high speed wireless operated very well too.

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Toronto Airport East
HotelInfo.Address: 600 Dixon Rd, Toronto, Ontario M9W 1J1, Canada (Formerly The Toronto Airport Hotel)
